en: It's true that Americans love pizza.
zh: 美国人确实很爱吃披萨。

en: The company's share price has fallen.

He's rich, though unfriendly.

en: The kitten slept soundly.
How do I use chopsticks?
A gentle breeze blew through the field.
The bee flew to the flower and drank the nectar.
I'm sorry, but I have forgotten your name.
zh: 不好意思，我忘了你叫什么名字了。

en: Like a lion attacking its prey, the kitten jumped on its toy.
zh: 小猫像狮子扑食一样扑向了它的玩具。

en: I cry every time I watch this movie.
zh: 每次看这部电影我都会哭。

en: The bird sang in the tree.
When I was young, I would play near that river.
zh: 我小时候常在那条河边玩。

en: Last week my grandmother turned 81 years old.
Do you have plans for next week?
Who teaches you German?
She brought me many novels in German.
zh: 她给我带了很多德语小说。

en: Does your wife know German?
Do your children know German?
I want to speak in German with Arnold Schwarzenegger.
zh: 我想和阿诺德·施瓦辛格用德语聊天。

en: I will introduce you some friends who study German.
zh: 我会介绍几个学德语的朋友给你认识。

en: Is German pronunciation difficult?
German is not as difficult as Icelandic.
zh: 德语没有冰岛语那么难。

en: Spanish is much easier than German.
zh: 西班牙语比德语简单多了。

en: The teacher of German looked like a German woman.
zh: 那个德语老师长得像个德国女人。

en: Has our teacher been to Germany?

en: I will try to translate more sentences into German.

en: Armenian is an Indo-European language.
zh: 亚美尼亚语属于印欧语系。

en: Why did you want to go to Armenia?
zh: 你当时为什么想去亚美尼亚？

en: Are there a lot of foreigners in Armenia?
zh: 亚美尼亚的外国人多吗？

en: Do you have any books about Armenia?
zh: 你有关于亚美尼亚的书吗？

en: When will you go to Armenia?

en: Do you remember the earthquake that struck Armenia in 1988?

en: Are there many tourists in Armenia?
Show me your pictures in Armenia.
zh: 给我看看你在亚美尼亚拍的照片。

en: There is no sea in Armenia.
There are still people who are unable to read.
I'm eating here.
I don't know what I want.
zh: 我不知道自己想要什么。

en: I didn't know that there was this sort of place just on the route to the high school.
zh: 我以前不知道去高中的路上竟然有这种地方。

en: There was someone sitting on a bench reading a book there.
zh: 当时那儿坐着个人在长椅上看书。

en: When asking him if it was interesting, he showed a gentle smile and affirmed that there is no such thing as something interesting.
zh: 问他这有没有意思时，他温和地笑了笑，肯定地说这世上压根就没有什么有意思的事。

en: As he walked away, his figure gradually became dim under the snow.
zh: 随着他走远，雪地里他的背影渐渐模糊了。

en: At this rate, it's a matter of time before I get caught.
zh: 照这样下去，我被抓是早晚的事。

en: We had a visitor when you were taking a shower.

en: The cup fell to the ground, shattering to pieces.

en: At the moment that I thought I was having a premonition, suddenly everything went black.
zh: 就在我以为自己有了预感的那一刻，突然眼前一黑。

en: Have you ever heard of Lucia Popp, who was a Slovakian opera singer?
zh: 你听过露西娅·波普吗？她是个斯洛伐克的歌剧演唱家。

en: If you don't think of an excuse quickly, things will become awkward.

en: There are probably few young people that like opera.

en: How many people do you think live in Thailand?

en: As soon as I woke up, the headache returned.
She works at the bank.
I need to work.
She interrupted me when I was speaking by putting her finger on my mouth.
zh: 我说话的时候，她把手指抵在我的嘴唇上打断了我。

en: Is there life on Mars? If not, was it there before?
zh: 火星上有生命吗？如果没有的话，以前有过吗？

en: The curtains are fluttering in the wind.
Since then, you were in a state of stupor for two months.
zh: 从那以后，你昏迷了整整两个月。

en: Yup, it seems like even the doctor was about to throw the towel.
zh: 是啊，看来连医生都打算放弃了。

en: All day long today I have been waiting impatiently for you.
zh: 今天一整天我都在心急火燎地等你。

en: How sad it is to have a memory that you'll never be able to recall again.
zh: 有些记忆再也回想不起来了，这该是件多悲哀的事啊。

en: I'm waiting for her.
I lost my hat on the bus.
zh: 我把帽子丢在公交车上了。

en: What is your favorite song?
Edith Piaf was a French singer.

en: Little Peach Tree is from Germany.
This is not my home.
I choose my friends for their good looks, my acquaintances for their good characters, and my enemies for their intellects. A man cannot be too careful in the choice of his enemies.
zh: 我看长相选朋友，看性格交熟人，看智商挑敌人。一个人在挑选敌人时，再怎么小心也不为过。

en: I didn't want to add this hoodlum as a friend on Twitter.
zh: 我压根不想在推特上加那个混混当好友。

en: Armenia joined the World Trade Organization in 2003.
zh: 亚美尼亚在2003年加入了世界贸易组织。

en: I'm all right.
When was the last time you saw the cat?

en: It is those who want to do important things that are free.
zh: 只有那些想做大事的人才是自由的。

en: I did it for you.
zh: 我是为了你才这么做的。

en: Only one of the tires is extremely flat. I wonder if it was punctured by a nail or something.
zh: 就一个轮胎瘪得特别厉害，我在想是不是被钉子什么的扎了。

en: Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan.

en: Is it hard to learn Esperanto?

en: Yesterday, the weather was very nice.

zh: 阿尔及利亚是欧盟非常重要的合作伙伴。

en: I will never forget that kind, loving woman.
zh: 我永远不会忘记那位善良、慈爱的女性。

en: This is my son's CD.

en: I'm really sorry to hear that.
zh: 听到这个消息我很难过。

en: When I don't have anything to say, I am not embarrassed to be quiet.
zh: 没话可说的时候，我并不觉得保持沉默有什么好尴尬的。

en: Love is a comedy in France, a tragedy in England, an opera in Italy, and a melodrama in Germany.
zh: 爱情在法国是喜剧，在英国是悲剧，在意大利是歌剧，在德国是通俗剧。

en: I don't think Tom is involved in that scandal.

en: Thank you for your concern about my mother and father.

en: They were happy when I told them.

en: I can't do this.

en: The best way to understand a sentence is to translate it.

en: We all want you to be happy.

Just look at him.

The patient is in a deep coma.
Look!

en: The best way to convince a fool that he is wrong is to let him have his way.
zh: 想让傻瓜承认错误，最好的办法就是让他由着性子来。

That's a stupid question!
What's done can't be undone.

en: And forgive us our debts, as we forgive our debtors.

en: And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us.

en: And forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive them that trespass against us.
zh: 原谅我们的过失，就像我们原谅了得罪我们的人一样。

en: There is no other way.

en: I wonder what you're looking at.

I'm all shook up!
I'm very excited.
Eh, do you know where the nail clippers that were here before are?

en: I am praying the time passes quickly.
zh: 我正祈祷着时间快点过去呢。

en: After the death of my father, it became clear that my mother was incompetent at handling the family finances.

en: My sister is my sister. I am who I am.

zh: 当词典里的例句不够用时，我就会用Tatoeba这个网站。

en: How many times do I have to tell you that Tatoeba is not a human being?

en: No Japanese girl is called Tatoeba.

zh: 再加上他长得挺帅的，在女校当老师其实不太合适。

en: When the sisters came back, their mother was still awake.

en: A drop in the bucket.

zh: 我老婆不在的时候，我也感觉自在些。

en: No, the life that a man and a woman build together is rarely happy, don't you think?

en: You love children, don't you?

zh: 我老婆好像连她自己的孩子都不喜欢。

en: The children were completely soaked.

zh: “让英国人和法国人拿走他们想要的土地吧，”印第安首领说道。“但他们想拿走从大西洋到太平洋之间的所有土地，这也可以吗？”汤姆说道。

Fire!

en: I'm working right now.
Tom has already eaten.

en: Tom seldom eats seafood.

zh: 图书馆门前的树下有几个人正在吃午饭。

en: The last time I ate at that restaurant the food wasn't very good.
zh: 上次在那家餐厅吃饭，味道不怎么好。

en: Some people think that eating grapefruit with every meal will help you lose weight.
zh: 有些人认为每顿饭都吃葡萄柚可以帮助减肥。

en: Since it was raining, we had to eat our picnic lunch indoors.

en: My children had eaten all the cookies by the time I got home.

zh: 要是我当时能和你一起去那家餐厅吃饭就好了。

en: I usually don't have time to eat a large lunch.

en: The young woman's face became even redder.

en: Her mother knew that her eldest daughter had signed up for a drama seminar, but she had no idea that she was so deeply involved as to appear on stage.

en: I'd be happy if you could come with us.

Tell me what Tom said.
Let me pay for your coffee.
Don't read my diary.
Don't look at me.
The Japanese embassy has warned Japanese citizens to be careful.
zh: 日本大使馆提醒日本公民要注意安全。

en: I hope they can reach a peaceful compromise.
zh: 我希望他们能达成和平妥协。

en: Tom has been living out of a suitcase for the past two months.
zh: 汤姆过去两个月一直过着四处漂泊的生活。

en: I'm supposed to eat with Tom this evening.
zh: 我今晚要和汤姆一起吃饭。

en: If you eat that, Tom will be angry.
zh: 你要是吃那个，汤姆会生气的。

en: The doctor told Tom to stop eating dog food.
zh: 医生让汤姆别再吃狗粮了。

en: Tom and Mary ate a six-course meal together.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽一起吃了一顿六道菜的正餐。

en: Tom ate a piece of the cake that Mary baked.
zh: 汤姆吃了块玛丽做的蛋糕。

en: Tom ate a quick lunch.
zh: 汤姆很快地吃完了午饭。

en: Tom ate his fill.
Tom ate your candy.
Tom has only fifteen minutes to eat his lunch.
zh: 汤姆只有十五分钟时间吃午饭。

en: Tom has some food allergies, so he has to be careful about what he eats.
zh: 汤姆有些食物过敏，所以他在吃的方面得特别小心。

en: Tom is having an allergic reaction to something he ate.
zh: 汤姆因为吃了点什么过敏了。

en: When Tom gets drunk, he'll eat a lot of things that he wouldn't eat when he's sober.
zh: 汤姆喝醉的时候，会吃很多他清醒时不会吃的东西。

en: You should eat.
If you don't want it, I'll eat it.
zh: 你不吃的话，我可就吃啦。

en: I can't decide where to eat lunch.
zh: 我还没决定好去哪儿吃午饭。

en: I can't believe you're eating what the doctor told you not to eat.
zh: 你居然在吃医生不让你吃的东西，真不敢相信。

en: I already ate.
If you tell a lie, Lord Emma will rip out your tongue.
zh: 如果你撒谎，阎王爷会拔了你的舌头。

en: Happy when borrowing, but upset when having to return it.
zh: 借的时候挺高兴，还的时候就不乐意了。

en: A person will have the face of an angel when borrowing something, but the face of the devil when returning it.
zh: 借东西的时候像天使，还东西的时候像恶魔。

en: I'm the middle child of three.
zh: 我在三兄弟姐妹里排行老二。

en: I'm the second oldest of three children.
zh: 我是三个孩子里的老二。

en: Don't look at me like that.
Elephants can't ride bicycles.
I like the Tatoeba logo.
Tom refused to follow Mary's advice.
zh: 汤姆不肯听玛丽的建议。

en: Show yourself.
Don't touch me.
Don't follow me.
Cut that out!
Why should I go to school?
She's an angel.
I didn't do anything!
He had the last laugh.
Tell Tom I said hi.
Say cheese.
Show me your passport.
Hug me.
Do you know that elephants have two enormous ears, but they still can't understand you?
zh: 你知道吗，大象虽然有两只巨大的耳朵，但它们还是听不懂你说的话。

en: She's not a regular employee of this company.
zh: 她不是这家公司的正式员工。

en: She's not a full-time employee of this company.
zh: 她不是这家公司的全职员工。

en: Tom has a history of drug abuse.
On school nights, Tom goes to bed at nine o'clock, but on Fridays and Saturdays, he stays up much later.
zh: 上学期间，汤姆九点就睡了，但周五和周六他会睡得晚得多。

en: Do you have the latest version?
My new phone is thinner than my old phone.
zh: 我的新手机比旧手机薄。

en: He's married to an American woman.
I'm not sure if he saw it.
I'm not sure when Tom will leave.
zh: 我不确定汤姆什么时候走。

en: I'm not sure what Tom will do.
zh: 我不确定汤姆会做什么。

en: It's very interesting.
I need a new car.
Do you still love her?
Do you still love him?
He still loves her.
He likes country music.
We can't turn back.
I'm sorry I hurt you.
Do you like my new haircut?
Shinji ate nine coconuts.
Please read the text below.
Why are you not doing it?
"You know Tom, don't you?" "I can't say that I do."
"Would you like a drink?" "I've already got one."
"Where's Tom?" "How would I know?"
"Let's buy Tom a car for his graduation present." "That's a great idea."
zh: “我们送辆车给汤姆当毕业礼物吧。”“这主意太棒了。”

en: "Let me get you a cup of coffee." "I'd appreciate that."
zh: “我给你倒杯咖啡吧。”“那就太感谢了。”

en: "I hear Tom and Mary are getting a divorce." "That's the rumor."
zh: “我听说汤姆和玛丽要离婚了。”“传闻是这么说的。”

en: "I have to stop you from doing that." "Stop me from doing what?"
zh: “我得阻止你那么做。”“阻止我做什么？”

en: "I can't figure this out." "That makes two of us."
"How much money does Tom make?" "How would I know?"
"Are you going to Tom's party?" "I'm still not sure."
zh: “你要去汤姆的派对吗？”“我还不确定。”

en: Hello.
I always drink a glass of milk before going to sleep.
zh: 我睡觉前总是会喝杯牛奶。

en: Don't worry. Tom will be fine.
Don't worry. It's easy.
Don't worry. I'll protect you.
Don't worry. I won't tell anyone.
zh: 别担心，我不会告诉任何人的。

en: Don't worry. I won't hurt her.
zh: 别担心，我不会伤害她的。

en: Don't worry about Tom. He isn't a threat.
zh: 别担心汤姆，他没什么威胁。

en: Don't worry about me so much.
Don't worry about it. Everything's going to be fine.
zh: 别担心，一切都会好起来的。

en: Don't waste your time.
Don't waste Tom's time.
Don't wait for me for dinner.
Don't touch my stuff.
Don't tell anyone.
Don't talk to Tom about this.
Don't talk to me.
Don't sass me.
Don't move unless I tell you.
Don't make me hurt you.
Don't make a scene.
Don't let Tom talk to anyone.
zh: 别让汤姆跟任何人说话。

en: Don't leave town.
Don't just stand there. Get in my car.
zh: 别在那儿愣着了，快上我的车。

en: Don't go there now.
Don't get paranoid.
Don't forget your bag.
Don't forget our date tomorrow.
zh: 别忘了我们明天的约会。

en: Don't flatter yourself.
Don't feel bad. Tom didn't give me a present either.
zh: 别难过，汤姆也没给我礼物。

en: Don't drink that.
Don't do this.
Don't do anything stupid, OK?
Don't burst my bubble.
Don't beat yourself up.
Don't be so lazy.
Don't be rude.
Don't be mean.
Don't be mad at me.
Don't act surprised.
Tell Tom to stop following me around.
zh: 告诉汤姆别再跟着我了。

en: Tell Tom I won't need his help.
zh: 告诉汤姆我不需要他的帮助。

en: Tell Tom I won't be needing his help.
zh: 告诉汤姆我不需要他的帮助。

en: Tell Tom I love him.
Tell Tom about what you did the other night.
zh: 告诉汤姆你那天晚上做了什么。

en: Tell me who you plan to go to Boston with.
zh: 告诉我你打算和谁一起去波士顿。

en: Tell me what you saw.
Tell me again who will be helping us.
zh: 再跟我说一遍谁会来帮我们。

en: Tell me again where you live.
zh: 再告诉我一遍你住哪儿。

en: Tell me about Tom.
Take the leftover food home with you.
Take care of Tom.
Take a seat. You look tired.
Take a deep breath and relax.
Stop the car.
Stop pretending you don't know the answer.
Stop calling me Tom.
Stop badgering me.
Lighten up.
Let me take a gander.
Let me see that list.
Let me know if you need anything.
Let me help.
Let me call you back.
Let me ask you a question.
Leave my family alone.
Leave me alone or I'll call the police.
zh: 离我远点，不然我报警了。

en: Leave a message and I'll call you.
zh: 留个言，我会给你回电话的。

en: Keep your voice down.
Keep your mouth shut.
Keep your hands off my stuff.
Just use mine for now.
Just tell me what you're looking for.
zh: 直接告诉我你在找什么就行。

en: Just tell me what you know about Tom.
zh: 就告诉我你对汤姆了解多少。

en: Just tell me what you know about the situation.
zh: 就把你知道的情况告诉我。

en: Just tell me what you know about the problem.
zh: 就告诉我你对这问题了解多少。

en: Just leave Tom alone.
Just keep your mind on your work.
Just close your eyes.
Just answer the question.
Go home. Get some rest.
Go get some towels.
Go find somebody who can help.
Go back to work.
Find out where Tom is.
Do it quickly.
Call me when you're ready.
Call me when it's done.
There is a fly buzzing in front of the fish shop.
zh: 鱼店门口有一只苍蝇在嗡嗡地叫。

en: This was her first job.
His parents love me.
I am a nurse.
The women achieved their goal.
zh: 那些女性达成了她们的目标。

en: Tom gave all the money he had to Mary.
zh: 汤姆把他所有的钱都给了玛丽。

en: It's easier to make money when you already have some.
We don't know why there's more matter than antimatter.
zh: 我们不知道为什么物质比反物质多。

en: The pen I lost yesterday was new.
zh: 我昨天丢的那支笔是新的。

en: Would you help me clean the bedroom?
zh: 你能帮我打扫一下卧室吗？

en: Get a grip on yourself!
The life span of a butterfly is short.
How can we achieve a balance between work and personal life?
zh: 咱们怎么才能平衡好工作和生活？

en: No smoking!
Tom would never do that.
Tom won't listen.
Tom will take you home.
Tom will not let Mary go.
Tom will have to wait.
Tom will be thrilled.
Tom will be there.
Tom watched Mary put sugar in her coffee.
zh: 汤姆看着玛丽往咖啡里加糖。

en: Tom was wearing a mask to conceal his identity.
zh: 汤姆戴着面具为了隐藏身份。

en: Tom was the only one hurt.
zh: 只有汤姆一个人受伤了。

en: Tom was supposed to meet me at 2:30.
zh: 汤姆本来该两点半跟我见面的。

en: Tom was smart not to sell his house at that time.
zh: 汤姆那时候没卖房挺聪明的。

en: Tom was quite handsome when he was young.
zh: 汤姆年轻的时候挺帅的。

en: Tom was my hero.
Tom was listening to his iPod as he worked out.
Tom was in his underwear.
Tom was holding a small box in his hands.
zh: 汤姆手里拿了个小盒子。

en: Tom was gunned down in the street in front of the church.
zh: 汤姆在教堂前的街上被枪杀了。

en: Tom was chewing on a toothpick.
zh: 汤姆嘴里叼着一根牙签。

en: Tom was born premature.
Tom was arrested.
Tom was about to leave when Mary knocked on the door.
zh: 汤姆正要走的时候，玛丽敲了门。

en: Tom was a very funny man.
zh: 汤姆是个非常幽默的人。

en: Tom wants to talk to you.
Tom wants to play.
Tom wants to help.
Tom wants to get married.
Tom wants me to apologize.
Tom wanted to see Mary.
Tom walked through the door.
Tom walked over to the desk.
Tom walked into Mary's room.
Tom walked in the room.
Tom used to dream of playing professional baseball.
zh: 汤姆以前梦想成为职业棒球选手。

en: Tom used to be our handyman.
zh: 汤姆以前是我们的杂工。

en: Tom used to bake us cookies.
zh: 汤姆以前常给我们烤饼干。

en: Tom unlocked the front gate.
Tom typed in the password.
Tom turned pale.
zh: 汤姆的脸刷地一下白了。

en: Tom turned on the light.
Tom turned off the water.
Tom tried to stay calm.
Tom tried to pick up his keys with his toes.
zh: 汤姆试着用脚趾头去夹钥匙。

en: Tom tried to open the door.
Tom tried not to hurt Mary.
zh: 汤姆尽量不去伤害玛丽。

en: Tom took the bottle of Scotch from his briefcase and handed it to Mary.
zh: 汤姆从公文包里拿出一瓶苏格兰威士忌递给了玛丽。

en: Tom took off his shirt.
Tom took a blanket off the bed and wrapped it around himself.
zh: 汤姆从床上拿了条毯子裹在身上。

en: Tom told Mary to go home.
Tom threatened me. He said if I didn't give him the money, he'd cut off one of my fingers.
zh: 汤姆威胁我，说如果我不给他钱，他就切掉我的一根手指。

en: Tom taught me how to cook.
Tom tapped on the window.
Tom stopped running and tried to catch his breath.
zh: 汤姆停下脚步，试着喘口气。

en: Tom stood up and walked to the window.
Tom stood up and headed for the door.
zh: 汤姆站起来朝门口走去。

en: Tom stepped off the train.
Tom stepped forward to kiss Mary, but she stepped back.
zh: 汤姆上前想亲玛丽，她却退后了。

en: Tom started to unbutton his shirt.
Tom slammed down the phone.
zh: 汤姆啪地一声挂断了电话。

en: Tom sits at his computer eight hours a day.
zh: 汤姆每天在电脑前坐八个小时。

en: Tom showed up at the party wearing a suit and tie.
zh: 汤姆西装革履地出现在派对上。

en: Tom showed me how to do it.
Tom shouldn't have told me.
Tom shouldn't have told Mary what John did.
zh: 汤姆不该把约翰做的事告诉玛丽。

en: Tom shouldn't have done that.
Tom should hear about this.
Tom shook his head.
Tom seems to like Boston.
zh: 汤姆好像挺喜欢波士顿的。

en: Tom seems nice.
Tom seems a little nervous.
Tom says he needs a nap.
Tom says he doesn't want a girlfriend.
zh: 汤姆说他不想交女朋友。

en: Tom saw Mary sitting alone on a park bench.
zh: 汤姆看见玛丽独自坐在公园长椅上。

en: Tom sat down on the couch.
zh: 汤姆在沙发上坐了下来。

en: Tom sat down next to Mary.
zh: 汤姆在玛丽旁边坐了下来。

en: Tom said he'd call at 2:30.
zh: 汤姆说他两点半打过来。

en: Tom rolled up his sleeves.
Tom rolled down the window.
Tom responded instantly.
Tom resisted the urge to scream.
zh: 汤姆忍住了尖叫的冲动。

en: Tom really cares about you.
Tom read the letter aloud.
zh: 汤姆大声读出了那封信。

en: Tom reached out his hand.
Tom reached for the dictionary on the top shelf.
zh: 汤姆伸手去够书架顶上的词典。

en: Tom reached for his knife.
Tom raked up all the leaves.
zh: 汤姆把落叶都耙到了一起。

en: Tom put the book down.
Tom put his wallet on the table.
zh: 汤姆把钱包放在了桌子上。

en: Tom pushed Mary off the edge of the cliff.
zh: 汤姆把玛丽推下了悬崖。

en: Tom pulled out a knife.
Tom pretended he was still asleep.
Tom picked the book off the floor.
zh: 汤姆把书从地板上捡了起来。

en: Tom passed out.
Tom packed a lunch for Mary to take to school.
zh: 汤姆给玛丽准备了带去学校的午餐。

en: Tom opened the door and walked in.
Tom opened the box and looked inside.
Tom opened his suitcase.
zh: 汤姆打开了他的行李箱。

en: Tom opened his eyes and saw Mary.
zh: 汤姆睁开眼看到了玛丽。

en: Tom offered Mary a chair.
zh: 汤姆给玛丽搬了把椅子。

en: Tom never listens to me.
Tom needs me.
Tom needs help.
Tom must have been asleep.
zh: 汤姆那时候肯定在睡觉。

en: Tom misses you.
Tom might be right.
Tom made me do that.
Tom made his choice.
Tom made a decision.
Tom looks sick.
Tom looks relieved.

zh: 汤姆看起来为他儿子感到自豪。

en: Tom looks exhausted.
Tom looks different.
Tom looks a little nervous.
Tom looked relieved.
Tom looked at the clock.
Tom looked at his watch.
Tom looked around the room.
Tom looked a bit surprised.
Tom lives on a boat.
Tom likes maple syrup on his pancakes.
zh: 汤姆喜欢在煎饼上加枫糖浆。

en: Tom liked that idea.
zh: 汤姆挺喜欢那个主意的。

en: Tom left after breakfast.
Tom leaned back in his chair.
Tom leads a quiet life.
Tom knows where Mary is.
Tom knows what's really going on.
zh: 汤姆知道到底是怎么回事。

en: Tom knows he's right.
Tom knows he has no choice.
Tom kissed Mary's forehead.
Tom kissed Mary passionately.
Tom kissed Mary on the neck.
Tom kissed Mary and then went to work.
zh: 汤姆亲了亲玛丽，然后去上班了。

en: Tom kicked open the door.
Tom kept my lighter.
zh: 汤姆留下了我的打火机。

en: Tom just wanted to be neighborly.
zh: 汤姆只是想表现得邻里友好。

en: Tom just showed up at work.
Tom just sat there looking bored.
zh: 汤姆就坐在那儿，一脸无聊的样子。

en: Tom just couldn't say no.
Tom isn't wearing a belt.
Tom isn't happy.
Tom isn't breathing.
Tom is working late.
Tom is wearing a blue bandana on his head.

en: Tom is waiting for you.
Tom is their leader.
Tom is telling the truth.
Tom is supposed to be here by now.
zh: 汤姆这会儿应该已经到了。

en: Tom is still crying.
Tom is still asleep.
Tom is sound asleep.
Tom is sitting at his desk.
Tom is right there.
Tom is on his way to the airport.

en: Tom held Mary tight.
Tom heard his name being called.
zh: 汤姆听见有人叫他的名字。

en: Tom hates you.
Tom hates me.
Tom hasn't told me anything.

zh: 汤姆最近没跟谁打过架。

en: Tom has to go home.
Tom has tattoos all over his body.
Tom has passed out.

zh: 汤姆有玛丽需要的信息。

en: Tom has been sending Mary flowers.

en: Tom has been following me around.
Tom has been crying all night.

Tom grabbed his bag.
Tom got off his horse.
Tom got in the car.

Tom doesn't have a cat. However, Tom does have a dog, doesn't he?

en: Tom doesn't have a car. He just uses Mary's.
zh: 汤姆没车。他就用玛丽的。

en: Tom doesn't hate you.
Tom didn't tell me.

zh: 汤姆没说他为什么迟到。

en: Tom didn't kill Mary.
Tom didn't have a choice.
Tom didn't have a chance to visit Mary when he was in Boston.
zh: 汤姆在波士顿的时候没机会去看玛丽。

en: Tom didn't even look at the report that Mary gave him.

Tom dialed the number again.
Tom couldn't find Mary.
Tom couldn't find his shoes.

en: Tom continued to honk the horn.
Tom comes here every single day.
Tom closed his eyes and went to sleep.

Tom checked his watch.

en: I took that photo a week ago.
zh: 那张照片是我一周前拍的。

en: I took that picture a week ago.
zh: 那张画是我一星期前拍的。

en: Tom, are you okay?
Tom, where are you?
Tom's cellphone rang and he answered it.
zh: 汤姆的手机响了，他接了电话。

en: Tom's cellphone rang.
I'm sorry about the other day.
zh: 那天的事儿，真是不好意思。

en: I'm sorry. I don't have a lot of time.
I'm sorry. That's really all I remember.
zh: 抱歉，我真的就记得这些了。

en: I hope you are in a safe place.
zh: 希望你待的地方很安全。

en: The sun shines brighter after the storm.
zh: 风雨过后的阳光更灿烂。

en: I took him to the hospital.
Tom wakes up at 8 a.m. every morning.
zh: 汤姆每天早上八点起床。

en: Darwin changed the world.
We spent the afternoon eating grapes.
zh: 我们一下午都在吃葡萄。

en: We're making progress.
Tom can't read.
Tom and Mary are great friends.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽是很好的朋友。

en: Tom and Mary both laughed.
Tom and Mary both started to laugh.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽都笑了起来。

en: Tom and Mary don't know that.
zh: 汤姆和玛丽不知道那件事。

en: Tom carried Mary across the threshold.
zh: 汤姆抱着玛丽跨过了门槛。

en: Tom didn't want to go any further.
Tom handed the photo back to Mary.
zh: 汤姆把照片还给了玛丽。

en: Tom is obviously a beginner.
Tom is obviously very good with his hands.
Tom is standing in the corner of the room.
zh: 汤姆站在房间的角落里。

en: Tom is still unconscious on the floor.
Tom noticed that Mary was asleep.
Tom picked the broken glass off the floor.
zh: 汤姆把地上的玻璃碎片捡了起来。

en: Tom picked the stuff up off the floor.
zh: 汤姆把地上的东西捡了起来。

en: Tom pretended not to understand French.
Tom pulled an MP3 player out of his bag.
zh: 汤姆从包里拿出了一个MP3播放器。

en: Tom put some food into the dog's dish.
zh: 汤姆往狗碗里放了些吃的。

en: Tom saw a vase of flowers on the table near the window.
zh: 汤姆看见靠窗的桌上有一瓶花。

en: Tom says he needs to ask Mary where she put his camera.
zh: 汤姆说他得问问玛丽把他的相机放哪儿了。

en: Tom showed Mary some pictures of his house.
zh: 汤姆给玛丽看了几张他房子的照片。

en: Tom snapped his fingers.
Tom started to leave, but Mary stopped him.
zh: 汤姆正要走，玛丽拦住了他。

en: Everyone, say cheese.
Have a good weekend.
I have seen him once.
He's a fine young man.
He has a nice body.
I am from France.
I'm from France.
This is not my first time riding a bicycle.
zh: 这不是我第一次骑自行车。

en: This is not my first time adding a sentence.
zh: 这不是我第一次添加句子。

en: This isn't my first time to drive a sports car.
zh: 这不是我第一次开跑车。

en: I'm coming back next week.
I'm going home next week.
Please return what you have borrowed.
Caution! Wet Paint
Recently, I don't have much appetite.
He's annoying.
Don't make me wait.
I was pleasantly surprised.
We went to Hakone last Sunday.
I want to rent this room to a student.
zh: 我想把这间房租给学生。

en: I'm having a hard time with German grammar.
zh: 德语语法搞得我很头疼。

en: His hair was long last year.
There's no need to go to school today.
You don't need to go to school today.
You don't have to go to school today.
I met him at Tom's house.
Tom won't be able to finish the job unless we help him.
zh: 要是没有我们帮忙，Tom肯定搞不定这活儿。

en: Tom won't admit it, but he's in big trouble.
zh: Tom不肯承认，但他麻烦大了。

en: Tom wasn't surprised that Mary was there.
zh: 玛丽在那儿，Tom一点都不意外。

en: Tom was standing just in front of a large building that was up for sale.
zh: Tom就站在一栋待售的大楼前。

en: Tom wants to keep things the way they are.
Tom tossed the keys to Mary.
Tom stopped talking when Mary walked into the room.
zh: 玛丽一进屋，Tom就不说话了。

en: Tom showed Mary a picture of John and another boy.
zh: Tom给玛丽看了约翰和另一个男孩的照片。

en: Tom just wants you to take care of his dog.
zh: Tom只是想让你帮他照看狗。

en: Tom just stood there watching everybody dance.
zh: Tom就站在那儿看着大家跳舞。

en: Tom has no idea when Mary will arrive.
zh: Tom根本不知道玛丽什么时候到。

en: Tom has no idea how to deal with this problem.
zh: Tom完全不知道该怎么处理这个问题。

en: Tom doesn't know anything about computer programming.
Where did you take your shoes off?
He teaches English to his friend.
A person who chases two rabbits won't catch either.
zh: 同时追两只兔子，一只也抓不到。

en: You are the reason I'm here.
zh: 我是为了你才在这里的。

en: How's Tom doing?
How's school?
How long has Tom been missing?
How long ago did you get here?
How do you know Tom?
How did Tom find us?
How come you didn't tell Tom about me?
How can we save Tom?
How are you two doing?
Have you seen Tom yet?
Have you seen this?
Have you heard from Tom?
Have you ever seen the man in this photo?
zh: 你见过照片里的这个人吗？

en: Have you been to Boston?
Have you been smoking?
Have you been listening to me?
Don't you want to know what it means?
zh: 你不想知道这是什么意思吗？

en: Don't you want to go?
Don't you think this computer game may be a little too difficult for Tom?
zh: 你不觉得这个游戏对Tom来说有点太难了吗？

en: Does Tom know?
Does Tom know who I am?
Does that make you sad?
Does everyone think it was me who stole the money?
zh: 大家都觉得是我偷了钱吗？

en: Do you want to try it?
Do you want to end up like Tom?
zh: 你想落得跟汤姆一个下场吗？

en: Do you want kids?
Do you understand everything?
Do you think I don't know that?
Do you smoke cigars?
Do you see anything?
Do you really need to go out in this kind of weather?
zh: 这种天气你真的非要出门吗？

en: Do you need a hand?
Do you love Tom?
Do you like robots?
Do you know who he was?
Do you know where we're going?
zh: 你知道我们要去哪儿吗？

en: Do you have to go now?
Do you have any more questions?
Do you have a search warrant?
Do you have a picture of Tom?
Do we have to be nice to Tom?
zh: 我们非得对汤姆那么客气吗？

en: Do I look OK?
Didn't you get Tom's message about today's meeting?
zh: 你没收到汤姆关于今天会议的消息吗？

en: Did you win the trophy?
Did you tell Tom?
Did you let Tom drive your car?
zh: 你让汤姆开你的车了吗？

en: Did you kill Tom?
Did Tom tell you who his wife is?
zh: 汤姆告诉你他老婆是谁了吗？

en: Did Tom tell you where the party is?
zh: 汤姆告诉你派对在哪儿了吗？

en: Did Tom tell you where he was last night?
zh: 汤姆告诉你他昨晚在哪儿了吗？

en: Did Tom tell you when he was going to take his vacation?
zh: 汤姆告诉你他打算什么时候去度假了吗？

en: Did Tom tell Mary who would be coming to the party?
zh: 汤姆告诉玛丽谁会来参加派对了吗？

en: Did Tom tell Mary when to come?
zh: 汤姆告诉玛丽什么时候过来吗？

en: Did Tom tell Mary how many apples to buy?
zh: 汤姆告诉玛丽要买多少个苹果了吗？

en: Did Tom talk to you about that?
zh: 汤姆跟你谈过那件事吗？

en: Did Tom talk to you about Mary?
Did Tom talk to you about his plans for next weekend?
zh: 汤姆跟你聊过他下周末的计划吗？

en: Did Tom see you?
Did Tom say why?
Did Tom say who was going to help him fix his car?
zh: 汤姆说谁会帮他修车了吗？

en: Did Tom say where he went for his summer vacation?
zh: 汤姆说他暑假去哪儿了吗？

en: Did Tom forgive you for what you did last week?
zh: 汤姆原谅你上周做的事了吗？

en: Did Tom do that?
Did Tom call?
Did they find anything?
Did anybody get hurt?
Could you read this for me?
Could you come up here, please?
Can you watch the kids?
zh: 你能帮我照看下孩子吗？

en: Can you tell me when Tom got his driver's license?
zh: 你能告诉我汤姆是什么时候拿到驾照的吗？

en: Can you see anything?
Can Tom help us?
Can I sit down?
Can I see that?
Can I get you something to eat?
Can I get a dog?
Aren't you glad you're retired?
zh: 退休了你难道不高兴吗？

en: Aren't you glad Tom isn't here?
zh: 汤姆不在，你难道不高兴吗？

en: Are you two OK?
Are you threatening me?
Are you thinking about Tom?
Are you still working with Tom?
zh: 你还在跟汤姆一起工作吗？

en: Are you still playing the guitar?
Are you still playing golf?
Are you still planning to marry Tom?
zh: 你还打算跟汤姆结婚吗？

en: Are you still living in Boston?
Are you crying?
Are you an idiot?
Are you afraid of me?
Am I going to die?
Am I bothering you?
You guys love each other, right?
Would you like to say something to everyone here?
zh: 你想对在场的大家说点什么吗？

en: Why is Tom home?
Why don't you come over tonight?
Why don't you come over for dinner?
Why don't we talk about this over dinner?
zh: 咱们边吃边聊这事儿怎么样？

en: Why do you hate Tom so much?
zh: 你为什么这么讨厌汤姆？

en: Why didn't you use a pay phone?
Why are you acting like you don't know me?
Why am I here?
Whose are they?
Who's Tom?
Who's this guy?
Who's on watch?
Who would care?
Where's Tom?
Where's the bag?
Where's my phone?
Where's my car?
Where's everyone?
Where's a mirror?
Where have you been lately?
Where exactly did you find that?
zh: 你到底在哪儿找到那个的？

en: Where exactly did you come from?
Where else would you like to go?
Where do you want to eat?
Where did you learn that?
Where did you buy this guitar?
zh: 你在哪儿买的这把吉他？

en: Where did that come from?
Where are they?
When was that?
